text_block_list.text:
After the Selection Race, I can’t stop thinking about the image 
of Gold City running on the riverside…

I want to know more about her. After that thought, 
when I was walking around the campusー

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
*Pant*. Alrighty, time update! Next 
time, try raising the level…

She is so focused on training that I can’t do it. It is also rude 
to disturb. I’ll talk to her laterー

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Yea~!! After all, it’s a great run, City-chan!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Huh…? Who are you?

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text: As you can see, I’m a trainer! I came to scout you!!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Eh, scout?…For real!?
…Damn it. He got ahead.!!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Oh, no… Ehm.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Mmm, then? If you want to scout, is there 
something like this? Tempo or Goals.

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Of course there is! I will make you the top Horse Girl there is.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Of course there is! I will make you the top Horse Girl there is.

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
No one can take their eyes from your run! The No. 1 Horse Girl 
who shines on the turf, Gold City! That's my future!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: …H-Hmmm.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Well, since it’s a trial period, I can go 
out with you for training for a while?

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Oh, hooray! Well then at once, let’s meet at the training time 
tomorrow! Alright, it will get busy, see you!!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Eh, Wai, you’re leaving already!?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Woah fast… he said only what he wanted 
to say. Is he the rush type?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
…”No one can take their eyes from your run” 
“I who shines on the turf” is it.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: …Ah—, I can’t! I can’t wait anymore! Impossible!!

Gold City suddenly ran away! I’m worried about what’s 
going to happen, so I chased after herー

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Aha,Alrighttt! Alright, alright, alright, alright, alright!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
To be honest I couldn’t produce good results, I thought maybe 
next time… it’s here, the scout! Alright!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: …They are here. People who see me as I’m.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: From here. From here, I will use this leg… I really am running…

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
G1 or whatever I will conquer you! So this time, I’m going to 
carve my name properly with my own power…!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
…Wait, it’s not the time to get carried away. In 
the Selection Race I got 5th place, for real.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: I will get back to training… Wait, woah!?
Oops! I’ve been noticed by Gold City…!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Eh, wait, you, I saw you before the selection 
race… like, eh? By any chance…

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Just now… did you hear that?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
~~~~Gh, don’t screw with me! You’re unbelievable 
for eavesdropping, you!!

After desperately trying to apologize, I confided 
that I came to scout and that I was worried about 
the situation and followed after her…

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: …Hmmm. You came out of worry, right.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
…Sigh. I got it, I got it, it’s enough now. 
This situation is like, I’m bullying you.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
FIrst forget about it, and if you promise 
not to tell anyone else, it’s okay.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Don’t tell me, you can’t do that, right?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Then, this talk is over. I’ll go back to training, 
you can do whatever you want after that.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Even if you say 『I came to scout』now, I’ve 
already got someone in charge of me.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Ugh, How downhearted. What is with you…

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Apologizing with a face that seems to cry, are you honest like or 
like… You’re the type of person who can’t lie, right?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Well, not that it matters to me…
choice_data_list: But that’s good enough, I’m cheering for you!
But that’s good enough, I’m cheering for you!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
…Th-Thank you. I don’t know what it means for a trainer to 
support another Horse Girl he isn’t in charge of.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Like, what I don’t understand isー

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
You, why didn’t you call me? From what we were talking about 
earlier, you were the first to come to the course.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: And yet, how did he get ahead of you?
choice_data_list: I can’t get in the way of your concentration…

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Huh? What is with that, ahahaha.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
You, you’re a good person. You’re the type 
of person to lose in life? You are.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
…Well, if you want to support me, just 
do it of your own accord. See ya.
